code: @Override public InputSplit getNextInputSplit(String host, int taskId) {     InputSplit next = null.     // keep the synchronized part short     synchronized (this.splits) {         if (this.splits.size() > 0) {             next = this.splits.remove(this.splits.size() - 1).         }     }     if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {         if (next == null) {             LOG.debug("No more input splits available").         } else {             LOG.debug("Assigning split " + next + " to " + host).         }     }     return next. }
